en.name: Sleep Like the Dead
en.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by {{30//35//40//45//50%}}. When the wearer's Basic ATK or Skill does not result in a CRIT Hit, increases their CRIT Rate by {{36//42//48//54//60%}} for 1 turn(s). This effect can only trigger once every 3 turn(s).

zh.name: 如泥酣眠
zh.description: 使装备者的暴击伤害提高{{30//35//40//45//50%}}。当装备者的普攻或战技伤害未造成暴击时，使自身暴击率提高{{36//42//48//54//60%}}，持续1回合。该效果每3回合可以触发1次。
